mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file (created_at, updated_at, enabled, dir, name, size, md, production_id, file_service_group_id) VALUES (#{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{enabled}, #{dir}, #{name}, #{size}, #{md}, #{productionId}, #{fileServiceGroupId})
mapper.update: UPDATE file SET enabled=#{enabled}, updated_at=#{updatedAt}, dir=#{dir}, name=#{name}, size=#{size}, md=#{md}, production_id=#{productionId}, file_service_group_id=#{fileServiceGroupId} WHERE id=#{id}
